headers: With a Club Membership, you get:
data: $8,000+ budget for supporting and growing the community
Preferred hotel rooms, room blocks, and travel arrangements
Up to 20% off Merch and Membership
Priority for Fursuit Workshops: Build fursuits with your friends, get advice, and access equipment + discounted materials.
Access to our extensive Alumni Network: Connect with professionals, faculty, and employers in industry and academia worldwide.
